about_the_game:
Little Gods and Ancient Echoes

Embark on an adventure to discover hidden treasures throughout the world!

Treasures come in many forms, including equipment items, currency, recipes, and music records.

Of course, the path to uncovering these treasures is perilous.

Monsters and traps will stand in your way.

If finding treasure were easy, someone else would have taken it all by now.

Life:

Before setting off on your journey, make sure to prepare sturdy equipment and tools. Luckily, no one will get to the treasure before you.

Farming & Livestock

In town, you can cultivate crops and raise adorable animals.

Use your harvested crops to stave off hunger, and restore your health and magic.

From animals, you can gather various resources to create food and equipment. With enough dedication, you’ll be rewarded with higher-quality yields.

Fishing

Fishing is also an option, as fish make excellent food sources. A variety of fish species awaits, though the bigger they are, the tougher they’ll be to catch.

Logging & Mining

Collect wood and minerals to gather essential materials. Use wood and stone to craft a variety of tools and gear.

Crafting

Use recipes to create various tools and foods, provided you have the ingredients. Of course, the quality of your ingredients affects the outcome. Collect top-tier materials and aim to craft the ultimate gear.

Mounts

Some destinations are too far to reach on foot. Don’t worry; there are friends to assist. From horses to other helpful animals, or even boats, you’ll have ways to explore with ease.

Combat

You’ll grow stronger through numerous combat encounters.

As you defeat monsters, your combat skills will naturally improve, and you can even extract essences from them to enhance your abilities.
